Secrets to configure for docker image publication

  For Docker Hub setup:
  Secrets:
  CONTAINER_REGISTRY_PASSWORD = your-dockerhub-token
  Variables:
  CONTAINER_REGISTRY = docker.io
  CONTAINER_REGISTRY_USERNAME = your-dockerhub-username
  CONTAINER_REGISTRY_PREFIX = your-dockerhub-username
  CONTAINER_REGISTRY_URL = https://hub.docker.com/u/your-username

  For AWS ECR setup:
  Secrets:
  CONTAINER_REGISTRY_PASSWORD = your-ecr-token
  Variables:
  CONTAINER_REGISTRY = 123456789012.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com
  CONTAINER_REGISTRY_USERNAME = AWS
  CONTAINER_REGISTRY_PREFIX = 123456789012.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com
  CONTAINER_REGISTRY_URL = https://console.aws.amazon.com/ecr/repositories
